summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1905, for the improvement of 13th Avenue Southwest from West Lander Street to Fink Place, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway 16 feet in width on the east side thereof, under Ordinance No. 19658 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
